column2: PDPD LUT config/enable table. Indexed by [pdpd_cfg]

column4: this bit controls (enabling/disabling) MGP/DDR coef LUT interpolation
column5: these 7 bits set the first 7 bits of register pdpd_cfg_reg

column14: this bit controls (enabling/disabling) non-linear magnitude LUT interpolation
column15: this bit controls (enabling/disabling) non-linear magnitude mapping
column16: this bit indicate who (0:CTRL reg, 1: sample count) control passthrough coef live update
column17: this bit indicate who (0:CTRL reg, 1: sample count) control Non-Lear Magnitude mapping LUT live update
column18: this bit indicate who (0:CTRL reg, 1: sample count) control GMP/DDR coef LUT live update
column19: this bit indicate who (0:CTRL reg, 1: sample count) control zero stuffing mode
column20: this bit indicate who (0:CTRL reg, 1: sample count) control bypass mode. bypass PDPD non-linear terms, used when doing ANT calibration

column13: default setting using sample count to control, also the LUT interpolation and LUT mapping are enabled
